steps.title: Locate Main Shutoff Valve
steps.description: Find the main water shutoff valve where water enters the property.
checks: Can you locate the shutoff valve?
Is the valve accessible and not obstructed?

steps.title: Operate the Valve
steps.description: Turn the valve clockwise until it stops. This should shut off water to the home.
checks: Did the water stop flowing from faucets?

steps.title: Reopen the Valve
steps.description: Turn the valve counterclockwise to restore water flow.

onFailure.message: Your shutoff valve may be failing or stuck. Book a diagnostic visit to confirm and replace if needed.

onPass.message: Your valve is working correctly. You can proceed with additional plumbing tasks.
